answers.answer: HI,How are you? What diagnostic tests were done already? Aside from infection, this could also be due to underlying medical conditions such as diabetes, bladder issues as well as other urological condition that warrants further evaluation by a urologist. Additional diagnostic tests such as cytoscopy and imaging studies may also be done to determine the underlying cause. Take care and do keep us posted.

question: I have been constantly urinating over a year now. I have had blood tests - clear , urine tests - clear , swab tests - clear .. Been tested for bacterial vaginosis, thrush, urine trapped infection, I've had antibiotics for all 3 but nothing changes I feel like my urine is trapped, it comes and goes for months I'm perfectly fine and normal then months I'm on the toilet 24/7 weeing, its as though half my wee come out, 10 mins later I'm on toilet again, it can sometimes be a few drops,I get a smelly odour with it too. Please someone help me its ruining my life I can't cope anymore. Doctors don't help they can't find nothing :( !!!!!!
title: urine/vaginal issues help me pls!!
